title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 258.9 - Leak detection system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 258.9 - Leak detection system

State Regulations

Each liquid petroleum pipeline shall have an acceptable
automatic leak detection system capable of initiating an alarm at a location
that is continuously monitored by personnel employed by the corporation and/or
is capable of effecting automatic shutdown of the pipeline. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
258.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
